程序包 model

类 Patient

Object
User
Patient
所有已实现的接口:
IUser
public class Patient extends User
The Patient class represents a patient in the system. It is a User and contains patient-specific information like the medical record.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Patient

      public Patient(String userId, String password, UserRole role, String name, boolean isMale, String email, Date dateofBirth, String bloodType, MedicalRecord medicalRecord)
      Constructs a new Patient with the specified details.
      参数:
      userId - the user ID for the patient
      password - the password for the patient
      role - the role of the patient (PATIENT)
      name - the name of the patient
      isMale - the gender of the user, true for Male, false for Female
      email - the email address of the user
      dateofBirth - the date of birth of the patient
      bloodType - the blood type of the patient
      medicalRecord - the medical record of the patient
      另请参阅:
      • User
